item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】Dolby Atmos - Blackhole 16ch for stereo stems?
item.description:
We‘re all aware of the fact that Blackhole loopback driver 16channel can grab dolby atmos files on a mac. But is there such a program which does it for stereo tracks? So that you could separate a stereo track into its stems?

(if so, no problem if on a mac or not, i have both)
item.author: nevidbowie
